title: Introduction to Plant Biology
description:
This course introduces students to the fascinating world of plants and their importance in our daily lives. Students will learn about different types of plants, their parts, and how they grow. The course explains the process of photosynthesis in a simple and clear way suitable for Class 6 students.

By the end of this course, students will be able to:

Identify parts of a plant (root, stem, leaves, flower)

Understand how plants make their own food

Learn the importance of sunlight, water, and soil

Differentiate between herbs, shrubs, and trees

Recognize the importance of plants in the environment

The course includes easy explanations, real-life examples, and engaging videos to make learning simple and enjoyable.
